snippet: For the fourth quarter, Kraft earned $931 million, or $1.54 a share, including a $1.11-a-share benefit tied to its retirement plans.
abstract: Kraft reports fourth-quarter earnings of $931 million, or $1.54 a share, up from $90 million, or 15 cents a share, one year earlier; quarterly revenue rose to $4.6 billion but was shy of $4.63 billion Wall Street had expected.
lead_paragraph: For the fourth quarter, Kraft earned $931 million, or $1.54 a share, including a $1.11-a-share benefit tied to its retirement plans.

headline.main: Profit Rises at Kraft but Is Short of Forecasts
headline.print_headline: Profit Rises at Kraft but Is Short of Forecasts
